mappings.notes: An OPC UA Subscription represents an active monitoring channel to a PLC/robot controller; mapped to Asset for lifecycle tracking.
A WriteValue operation is a Portarium Task â€” it actuates a robot controller register and requires approval.
OPC UA NodeIds are address-space references; ExternalObjectRef links to specific PLC nodes in task parameters.
DataValues are telemetry readings; surfaced as ExternalObjectRef in cockpit sensor panels.
Browse results enumerate available nodes; ExternalObjectRef for address-space discovery artefacts.
Monitored item configuration is an infrastructure ExternalObjectRef linked from the Asset (Subscription).
